Copy SQL Join to CODA Integration

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
Nine.RegistrationID AS Nine_RegistrationId,
Nine.Numberofrecords AS Nine_Numberofrecords,
Nine.DebitRevenue AS Nine_DebitRevenue,
Nine.CreditSales AS Nine_CreditSales,
Nine.Multiplefilecode AS Nine_Multiplefilecode,
Eight.RegistrationID AS Eight_RegistrationId,
Eight.Accountnumber AS Eight_Accountnumber,
Eight.NewBalance AS Eight_NewBalance ,
Eight.Dateofnewbalance AS Eight_Dateofnewbalance,
One.RegistrationID AS One_RegistrationId,
One.BankAccountType AS One_BankAccountType,
One.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS One_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
One.Accountnumber AS One_Accountnumber,
One.Oldbalance AS One_Oldbalance,
One.Oldpay AS One_Oldpay ,
One.Dateofoldbalance AS One_Dateofoldbalance,
One.Accountholdername AS One_Accountholdername,
TwoOne.RegistrationID AS TwoOne_RegistrationId,
TwoOne.Sequencenumber AS TwoOne_Sequencenumber,
TwoOne.Amount AS TwoOne_Amount,
TwoOne.Valuedate AS TwoOne_Valuedate,
TwoOne.Accountdate AS TwoOne_Accountdate,
TwoTwo.RegistrationID AS TwoTwo_RegistrationId,
TwoTwo.Customerreference AS TwoTwo_Customerreference,
TwoTwo.BIC AS TwoTwo_BIC,
TwoTwo.Linkcode AS TwoTwo_Linkcode,
TwoThree.RegistrationID AS TwoThree_RegistrationId,
TwoThree.ArticleCode AS TwoThree_ArticleCode,
TwoThree.Counterpartyaccountnumber AS TwoThree_Counterpartyaccountnumber,
TwoThree.Nameofcounterparty AS TwoThree_Nameofcounterparty,
TwoThree.SuiteCode AS TwoThree_SuiteCode,
ThreeOne.RegistrationID AS ThreeOne_RegistrationId,
ThreeOne.ArticleCode AS ThreeOne_ArticleCode,
ThreeOne.CommunicationCode AS ThreeOne_CommunicationCode,
ThreeOne.MoreCode AS ThreeOne_MoreCode,
ThreeTwo.RegistrationID AS ThreeTwo_RegistrationId,
ThreeTwo.Sequencenumber AS ThreeTwo_Sequencenumber ,
ThreeTwo.ArticleCode AS ThreeTwo_ArticleCode,
ThreeTwo.Communication AS ThreeTwo_Communication,
Zero.RecordIdentification AS Zero_RecordIdentification,
Zero.CreationDate AS Zero_CreationDate ,
Zero.BankIdentificationNumber AS Zero_BankIdentificationNumber,
Zero.ApplicationCode AS Zero_ApplicationCode,
Zero.BIC AS Zero_BIC,
Zero.IdentificationNumberofBelgium AS Zero_IdentificationNumberofBelgium
from 
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-21]) TwoOne 
Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-22]) TwoTwo on TwoOne.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
Left OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-23]) TwoThree on TwoThree.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-31]) ThreeOne on ThreeOne.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-32]) ThreeTwo on ThreeTwo.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-33]) ThreeThree on ThreeThree.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-1]) One on One.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-8]) Eight on Eight.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RegistrationID) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-9]) Nine on Nine.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num
LEFT OUTER Join
(SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RecordIdentification) AS row_num FROM [dbo].[COD-0]) Zero on Zero.row_num = TwoTwo.row_num

activities.name: Copy SQL Join to CODA Integration

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
NEWID() AS GUID,
Zero.RecordIdentification AS Zero_RecordIdentification,
Zero.CreationDate AS Zero_CreationDate,
Zero.BankIdentificationNumber AS Zero_BankIdentificationNumber,
Zero.ApplicationCode AS Zero_ApplicationCode,
Zero.Duplicate AS Zero_Duplicate,
Zero.FileReference AS Zero_FileReference,
Zero.NameAddressee AS Zero_NameAddressee,
Zero.BIC AS Zero_BIC,
Zero.IdentificationNumberofBelgium AS Zero_IdentificationNumberofBelgium,
Zero.CodeSeperateApplication AS Zero_CodeSeperateApplication,
Zero.TransactionReferrence AS Zero_TransactionReferrence,
Zero.RelatedReferrence AS Zero_RelatedReferrence,
One.RegistrationID AS One_RegistrationId,
case One.BankAccountType
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     when '2' then 899240002
     when '3' then 899240003
     end AS One_BankAccountType,
One.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS One_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
One.Accountnumber AS One_Accountnumber,
case One.Oldbalance
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS One_Oldbalance,
One.Oldpay AS One_Oldpay,
One.Dateofoldbalance AS One_Dateofoldbalance,
One.Accountholdername AS One_Accountholdername,
One.Accounttagged AS One_Accounttagged,
One.Sequencenumberofthecodified AS One_Sequencenumberofthecodified,
Four.RegistrationID AS Four_RegistrationID,
Four.Textofthefreemessage AS Four_Textofthefreemessage,
Eight.RegistrationID AS Eight_RegistrationId,
Eight.Sequencenumber AS Eight_Sequencenumber,
Eight.Accountnumber AS Eight_Accountnumber,
case Eight.SignCode
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS Eight_SignCode,
Eight.NewBalance AS Eight_NewBalance ,
Eight.Dateofnewbalance AS Eight_Dateofnewbalance,
Nine.RegistrationID AS Nine_RegistrationId,
Nine.Numberofrecords AS Nine_Numberofrecords,
Nine.DebitRevenue AS Nine_DebitRevenue,
Nine.CreditSales AS Nine_CreditSales
from [dbo].[COD-0] Zero
left join [dbo].[COD-1] One on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[COD-4] Four on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[COD-8] Eight on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[COD-9] Nine on 1=1

dependsOn.activity: Copy SQL Join to CODA Integration

activities.name: Copy SQL Join to Payment Table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
NEWID() AS GUID,
'CODA' AS Data_Source,
Zero.FileReference AS Zero_FileReference,
CODA.GUID AS CODA_Guid,
TwoOne.RegistrationID AS TwoOne_RegistrationId,
TwoOne.Sequencenumber AS TwoOne_Sequencenumber,
TwoOne.Retailnumber AS TwoOne_Retailnumber,
TwoOne.bankreferencenumber AS TwoOne_bankreferencenumber,
case TwoOne.Movementsign
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS TwoOne_Movementsign,
TwoOne.Amount AS TwoOne_Amount,
TwoOne.Valuedate AS TwoOne_Valuedate,
TwoOne.OperationCode AS TwoOne_OperationCode,
case TwoOne.communicationtype
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS TwoOne_communicationtype,
TwoOne.Communicationzone AS TwoOne_Communicationzone,
TwoOne.Accountdate AS TwoOne_Accountdate,
TwoOne.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS TwoOne_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
TwoOne.Codeglobalization AS TwoOne_Codeglobalization,
TwoTwo.RegistrationID AS TwoTwo_RegistrationId,
TwoTwo.Communication AS TwoTwo_Communication,
TwoTwo.Customerreference AS TwoTwo_Customerreference,
TwoTwo.BIC AS TwoTwo_BIC,
case TwoTwo.Transactiontype
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
	 when '2' then 899240002
     when '3' then 899240003
	 when '4' then 899240004
     end AS TwoTwo_Transactiontype,
TwoTwo.ISOCode AS TwoTwo_ISOCode,
TwoTwo.CategoryPurpose AS TwoTwo_CategoryPurpose,
TwoTwo.Purpose AS TwoTwo_Purpose,
TwoThree.RegistrationID AS TwoThree_RegistrationId,
TwoThree.Counterpartyaccountnumber AS TwoThree_Counterpartyaccountnumber,
TwoThree.Nameofcounterparty AS TwoThree_Nameofcounterparty,
TwoThree.Communication AS TwoThree_Communication,
ThreeOne.RegistrationID AS ThreeOne_RegistrationId,
ThreeOne.AdditionalInformation AS ThreeOne_AdditionalInformation,
ThreeOne.OperationCode AS ThreeOne_OperationCode,
case ThreeOne.CommunicationCode
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS ThreeOne_CommunicationCode,
ThreeOne.Communication AS ThreeOne_Communication,
ThreeTwo.RegistrationID AS ThreeTwo_RegistrationId,
ThreeTwo.Communication AS ThreeTwo_Communication,
ThreeThree.RegistrationID AS ThreeThree_RegistrationId,
ThreeThree.Communication AS ThreeThree_Communication 
from [dbo].[CODA-21] TwoOne
left join [dbo].[CODA-22] TwoTwo on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = TwoTwo.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-23] TwoThree on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = TwoThree.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-31] ThreeOne on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeOne.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-32] ThreeTwo on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeTwo.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-33] ThreeThree on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeThree.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-0]  Zero       on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[CODAIntegration]  CODA  on 1=1

dependsOn.activity: Copy SQL Join to Payment Table

select
NEWID() AS GUID,
Zero.RecordIdentification AS Zero_RecordIdentification,
Zero.CreationDate AS Zero_CreationDate,
Zero.BankIdentificationNumber AS Zero_BankIdentificationNumber,
Zero.ApplicationCode AS Zero_ApplicationCode,

Zero.TransactionReferrence AS Zero_TransactionReferrence,
Zero.RelatedReferrence AS Zero_RelatedReferrence,
One.RegistrationID AS One_RegistrationId,
case One.BankAccountType
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     when '2' then 899240002

     end AS One_BankAccountType,
One.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS One_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
One.Accountnumber AS One_Accountnumber,

     when '0' then 899240000

     end AS Eight_SignCode,

source.sqlReaderQuery:
delete from GTFS
SELECT TOP(10) Agencies.Agency_name,
      10 AS Agency_id,
      Agencies.Agency_url,
      Agencies.Agency_timezone,
      Agencies.Agency_lang,
      Agencies.Agency_phone,
	  Route.Route_id,
	  Route.Route_short_name,
	  Route.Route_long_name,
	  Route.Route_desc,
	  10 AS Route_type,
	  Route.Route_url,
	  trip.Trip_id,
	  CONVERT(int, trip.Trip_short_name) AS Trip_short_name,
	  10 AS Direction_id,
	  trip.Block_id,
	  Cal.Service_id,	  
          case when Cal.Monday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Monday,   
		  case when Cal.Tuesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Tuesday, 
		  case when Cal.Wednesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Wednesday, 
		  case when Cal.Thursday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Thursday, 
		 case when Cal.Friday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Friday, 
		  case when Cal.Saturday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Saturday, 
		 case when Cal.Sunday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Sunday, 
	  Cal.Start_date,
	  Cal.End_date,
	  CalDate.Date,
	  10 AS Exception_type,
	  Shape.shape_id,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lat) AS shape_pt_lat,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lon) AS shape_pt_lon,
	  CONVERT(int, Shape.shape_pt_sequence) AS shape_pt_sequence,
	  NEWID() as GuId
  FROM [Routes] Route
  LEFT JOIN [Agency] Agencies
    ON Route.Agency_id = Agencies.Agency_id	
	JOIN [Trips] trip
    ON Route.Route_id = trip.Route_id
	JOIN [CalendarUpdate] Cal
    ON Cal.Service_id=trip.Service_id
	JOIN [calendar_dates_update] CalDate
	 ON Cal.Service_id=CalDate.Service_id
	JOIN [Shapes] Shape
    ON Shape.shape_id = trip.Shape_id
  ORDER by Agencies.Agency_id

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to CRM
